casebody.data:
J. & S. Watson v. John Delafield. ON a motion for a commission, Pendleton objected, because notice of the application had not been given. Hoffman.

The decision, making it necessary, was. pronounced only yesterday, and this is the last day of term.

*408Per Curiam.

That would have afforded a sufficient reason for not giving the regular notice, but notice is requisite in all cases. Take nothing by your motion.
